info.title: Encodian Document Manager
info.description: Enhanced document management and PDF creation capabilities for Office 365, Flow, Logic Apps + more

license.name: Requires an 'Encodian PDF Converter for SharePoint Online' or 'Document Manager for Microsoft Flow' subscription

post.description: Convert a document to PDF or PDF/A format - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360011123574-Convert-to-PDF
Convert a PDF document to PDF/A format - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360010578413-Convert-PDF-to-PDFA
Encrypt and protect a PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360011330134-Secure-PDF-Document
Set the privledges assigned to the PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360011337094-Set-PDF-Document-Privileges
Convert the text provided to a PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360011683054-Convert-Text-to-PDF
Convert the HTML or Web URL provided to a PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360022205154-Convert-HTML-to-PDF
Convert the HTML or Web URL provided to a Microsoft Word document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360011823213-Convert-HTML-to-Word
Insert the HTML provided into a PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360011784354-Insert-HTML-to-PDF
Convert and merge the documents provided to a single PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360011886173-Merge-documents-to-PDF
Convert and merge an array of documents to a single PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360014632213-Merge-document-array-to-PDF
Convert and merge an array of Microsoft Word documents to a single Microsoft Word document (DOCX).
Perform OCR on an existing PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360012686653-OCR-a-PDF-Document
Convert the Word document provided (Legacy Form Controls Only) to a PDF form document. - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360012307133-Convert-Word-to-PDF-Form
Add a text watermark to the specified PDF document using the standard options - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360012230494-Add-Text-Watermark
Add an image watermark to the specified PDF document using the standard options - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360012484094-Add-Image-Watermark
Add a text watermark to the specified PDF document using the advanced options - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360012345813-Add-Text-Watermark-Advanced-
Add an image watermark to the specified PDF document using the standard options - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360012485874-Add-Image-Watermark-Advanced-
Execute image clean up activities focussed on text based images such as Deskew, Rotate, Despeckle + more.
Execute image clean up activities for standard photo images.
Extract text using OCR from 70+ files types using specified regions - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360015612353-Extract-Text-from-Regions
Add a HTML header, footer or both to the specified PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360013808614-Add-HTML-Header-or-Footer
Add page numbers to the PDF document provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360014464534-Add-Page-Numbers
Get the text layer for the PDF document provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360015539373-Get-PDF-Text-Layer
Apply the specified redactions to the PDF document provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360018607954-Redact-PDF-
Resize and compress the image provided - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360018591034-Resize-an-Image
Extract PDF form data from a PDF Form.
Find and replace text contained within a PDF document - https://support.encodian.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360020937853-Search-and-Replace-Text

FileName.description: The filename of the source file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.xlsx' and not 'file'

fileContent.description: The content of the source file

outputFilename.description: The filename of the output PDF document

removeDocumentMarkup.description: Set MS Office document comments and tracked changes removal option

pdfaComplianceLevel.description: Set the PDF/A Compliance Level, the default value is PDF_A_2A.

GenerateBookmarks.description: Set whether bookmarks should be automatically created for Microsoft Word documents which are converted to PDF.

CultureName.description: This setting only applies to Microsoft Excel documents and is used to set the culture for the workbook prior to conversion.

FinalOperation.description: Set whether this is the final operation for this document

textEncodingType.description: The encoding type used for text conversion.

FileName.description: The filename of the source HTML file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.html' and not 'file'

outputFilename.description: The filename of the output PDF document

fileContent.description: Optional - The content of the source HTML file.

htmlData.description: Optional - The HTML which will be converted to a PDF document

htmlUrl.description: Optional - The web address to the web page which will be converted to a PDF document

pageSize.description: Set the page size for the output PDF document, A4 is the default size.

decodeHtmlData.description: Set whether the data provided in the HTML Data field should be decoded.

encoding.description: Set the encoding type for the HTML.

MarginTop.description: Set the top margin value (pt. The default value is set to -1, whereby a minus value does not change the existing page margin value.

MarginBottom.description: Set the bottom margin value (pt. The default value is set to -1, whereby a minus value does not change the existing page margin value.

MarginRight.description: Set the right margin value (pt. The default value is set to -1, whereby a minus value does not change the existing page margin value.

MarginLeft.description: Set the left margin value (pt. The default value is set to -1, whereby a minus value does not change the existing page margin value.

FinalOperation.description: Set whether this is the final operation for this document

HttpStatusCode.description: The HTTP Status code for the response.

HttpStatusMessage.description: The HTTP Status message for the response.

Operation Status.description: Indicates whether the operation has completed, has been queued or has failed.

FileName.description: The filename of the source PDF file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.pdf' and not 'file'

FileContent.description: Optional - Content of the source PDF file

OperationId.description: Optional - The identifier of a source operation

cleanUpType.description: Perform document clean-up operations, the default option will auto rotate, auto deskew and auto despeckle the document.

RemoveBlankPages.description: Set whether blank pages should be removed from the PDF document.

pdfaComplianceLevel.description: Set the PDF/A Compliance Level, the default value is PDF_A_2A.

AutoRotate.description: Automatically detects orientation and rotates it so that the text on it is upright oriented, this is enabled by default.

AutoRotateConfidenceLevel.description: Sets the minimum confidence percentage (0 to 100) used to control whether the rotation is applied, the default value is 60.

Deskew.description: Detects the skew angle and rotates to remove that skew, this is enabled by default.

Despeckle.description: Automatically detects speckles and removes them, this is enabled by default.

AdjustBrightnessContrast.description: This action analyzes a document and automatically adjusts brightness and contrast based on the analysis, this is enabled by default.

RemoveBorder.description: Locates border pixels and removes the pixels from the document,this is disabled by default.

SmoothBackground.description: This works only on color and grayscale documents. This operation smoothes background colors to eliminate or de-emphasize noise, this is disabled by default.

SmoothObjects.description: This only works on bitonal documents, it looks at groups of pixels, and finds isolated bumps and pits in the edges of those objects, and fills them in, this is disabled by default.

RemoveDotShading.description: This action will remove shaded regions from bitonal documents, this is disabled by default.

ImageDetergent.description: Image Detergent works by changing pixels of similar color values to a central color value, which has the result of smoothing the image wherever regions of those colors appear, this is disabled by default.

ApplyAverageFilter.description: Performs a 3x3 Average filter smoothing operation on the document, placing the output in the center of the window, this is disabled by default.

RemoveHolePunch.description: Detects and removes hole punch marks from a bitonal document, this is disabled by default.

Binarize.description: Computes all necessary parameters by analyzing the input data before actually performing the binarization. The algorithm is tuned to typical document images, consisting of dark text on brighter background. It is robust to shadows, noise and background images, this is disabled by default.

FinalOperation.description: Set whether this is the final operation for this document

textLayerAdded.description: Indicates whether OCR was performed on the document provided

fileContent.description: Optional - The content of the source PDF file

Text.description: The text to embed as a watermark within the document

Orientation.description: The orientation of the text to embed as a watermark within the document

Font.description: The font applied to the text watermark, the default font is set to Helvetica.

TextColour.description: The HTML colour applied to the text watermark, the default colour is set to #E81123.

TextSize.description: The size of the font applied to the text watermark, the default size is set to 34.

Opacity.description: The opacity of the text watermark, valid values range from 0.0+ to 1.0, the default value is 1.0

FinalOperation.description: Set whether this is the final operation for this document

watermarkFilename.description: The filename for the watermark image file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.jpg' and not 'file'

Orientation.description: The orientation of the image to embed as a watermark within the document

FileName.description: The filename of the source PDF file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.pdf' and not 'file'

fileContent.description: Optional - The content of the source PDF file

operationId.description: Optional - The identifier of a source operation

Text.description: The text to embed as a watermark within the document. Add carriage return control characters (backslash r) to manually split text onto new lines.

Font.description: The font applied to the text watermark, the default font is set to Helvetica.

TextColour.description: The HTML colour applied to the text watermark, the default colour is set to #E81123.

TextSize.description: The size of the font applied to the text watermark, the default size is set to 34.

Opacity.description: The opacity of the text watermark, valid values range from 0.0+ to 1.0, the default value is 1.0

EncodingType.description: The encoding type to apply to the text watermark.

HorizontalAlignment.description: Set the horizontal alignment of the watermark, the default value is Center.

VerticalAlignment.description: Set the vertical alignment of the watermark, the default value is Center.

TextAlignment.description: Set the text alignment of the watermark, the default value is Center.

ApplyTo.description: Set where in the document to apply the watermark.

pageNumbers.description: Specify the page numbers where the watermark should be applied, this proporty only applies when the 'Apply To' property is set to 'Specific'.

RotationAngle.description: Set the rotation angle of the text watermark.

TextWrap.description: Set whether the text watermark should automatically wrap.

TextWrapRowWidth.description: Set the row width applied when the watermark is set to automatically wrap.

AutoScale.description: Set the whether the text should be automatically sized to fit the width of the container.

AutoScaleWidth.description: Set the width of the watermark container when automatic scaling is enabled.

AutoScaleHeight.description: Set the height of the watermark container when automatic scaling is enabled.

TextLayer.description: Set whether the watermark should be added to the top or bottom layer. If 'True' the watermark is added to the bottom layer.

YIndent.description: Set the vertical watermark indent, starting from the bottom and overriding the VerticalAlignment property.

XIndent.description: Set the horizontal watermark indent, starting from the left and overriding the HorizontalAlignment property.

watermarkApplyAsImage.description: Set whether the text watermark should be added as text or an image.

FinalOperation.description: Set whether this is the final operation for this document

HttpStatusCode.description: The HTTP Status code for the response.

HttpStatusMessage.description: The HTTP Status message for the response.

OperationId.description: The unique ID assigned to this operation.

Errors.description: An array of error messages should an error occur.

Operation Status.description: Indicates whether the operation has completed, has been queued or has failed.

FileName.description: The filename of the source PDF file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.pdf' and not 'file'

fileContent.description: Optional - The content of the source PDF file

operationId.description: Optional - The identifier of a source operation

watermarkFileContent.description: The content of the watermark image file

watermarkFilename.description: The filename for the watermark image file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.jpg' and not 'file'

opacity.description: The opacity of the text watermark, valid values range from 0.0+ to 1.0, the default value is 1.0

applyTo.description: Set where in the document to apply the watermark.

pageNumbers.description: Specify the page numbers where the watermark should be applied, this only applies when the 'Apply To' property is set to 'Specific'.

rotationAngle.description: Set the rotation angle of the image watermark in degrees.

quality.description: Set the quality of the image watermark from 1 to 100.

imageXOffset.description: Set the X offset for positioning the watermark image on the page.

imageYOffSet.description: Set the Y offset for positioning the watermark image on the page.

scale.description: Set the multiple to either reduce (less than 1.0) or increase the size of the image (greater than 1.0), for example: 1.2 is equal to 120%, and 0.7 is equal to 70%.

addToBackground.description: If set to 'true' the watermark image will be added to the background of the page.

FinalOperation.description: Set whether this is the final operation for this document

HttpStatusCode.description: The HTTP Status code for the response.

FileName.description: The filename of the source image file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.png' and not 'file'

FileContent.description: The content of the source image file

cleanUpType.description: Perform file clean-up operations, the default option will auto rotate, auto deskew and auto despeckle the provided file.

AutoRotate.description: Automatically detects orientation and rotates so that the text is upright oriented, this is enabled by default.

AutoRotateConfidenceLevel.description: Sets the minimum confidence percentage (0 to 100) used to control whether the rotation is applied, the default value is 60.

Deskew.description: Detects the skew angle and rotates to remove that skew, this is enabled by default.

Despeckle.description: Automatically detects speckles and removes them, this is enabled by default.

AdjustBrightnessContrast.description: This action analyzes a document and automatically adjusts brightness and contrast based on the analysis, this is disabled by default.

RemoveBorder.description: Locates border pixels and removes the pixels from the document, this is disabled by default.

SmoothBackground.description: This works only on color and grayscale documents. This operation smoothes background colors to eliminate or de-emphasize noise, this is disabled by default.

SmoothObjects.description: This only works on bitonal documents, it looks at groups of pixels, and finds isolated bumps and pits in the edges of those objects, and fills them in, this is disabled by default.

RemoveDotShading.description: This action will remove shaded regions from bitonal documents, this is disabled by default.

ImageDetergent.description: Image Detergent works by changing pixels of similar color values to a central color value, which has the result of smoothing the image wherever regions of those colors appear, this is disabled by default.

ApplyAverageFilter.description: Performs a 3x3 Average filter smoothing operation on the document, placing the output in the center of the window, this is disabled by default.

RemoveHolePunch.description: Detects and removes hole punch marks from a bitonal document, this is disabled by default.

Binarize.description: Computes all necessary parameters by analyzing the input data before actually performing the binarization. The algorithm is tuned to typical document images, consisting of dark text on brighter background. It is robust to shadows, noise and background images, this is disabled by default.

FinalOperation.description: Set whether this is the final operation for this document

HttpStatusCode.description: The HTTP Status code for the response.

HttpStatusMessage.description: The HTTP Status message for the response.

OperationId.description: The unique ID assigned to this operation.

Errors.description: An array of error messages should an error occur.

Operation Status.description: Indicates whether the operation has completed, has been queued or has failed.

FileName.description: The filename of the source image file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.png' and not 'file'

FileContent.description: The content of the source image file

cleanUpType.description: Perform file clean-up operations, the default option will auto rotate, apply colour balance, auto deskew and auto despeckle the provided file.

Deskew.description: Detects the skew angle and rotates to remove that skew, this is enabled by default.

Despeckle.description: Automatically detects speckles and removes them, this is enabled by default.

ColorBalance.description: Restores and balances the color quality within an image, this is enabled by default.

RemoveBorder.description: Locates border pixels and removes the pixels from the document, this is disabled by default.

Contrast.description: Adjusts the contrast in the current image.

RemoveRedeye.description: Automatically reduces the red reflection of the flash seen in the eyes of people in color flash photo images.

Blur.description: Blurs the current image by averaging each pixel with each of its neighboring pixels giving it an 'out of focus' appearance.

Diffuse.description: Diffuses the current image by replacing each pixel with a randomly selected neighboring pixel.

Binarize.description: Computes all necessary parameters by analyzing the input data before actually performing the binarization. The algorithm is tuned to typical document images, consisting of dark text on brighter background. It is robust to shadows, noise and background images, this is disabled by default.

AutoRotate.description: Automatically detects orientation and rotates so that the text is upright oriented, this is enabled by default.

AutoRotateConfidenceLevel.description: Sets the minimum confidence percentage (0 to 100) used to control whether the rotation is applied, the default value is 40.

FinalOperation.description: Set whether this is the final operation for this document

HttpStatusCode.description: The HTTP Status code for the response.

HttpStatusMessage.description: The HTTP Status message for the response.

OperationId.description: The unique ID assigned to this operation.

Errors.description: An array of error messages should an error occur.

Operation Status.description: Indicates whether the operation has completed, has been queued or has failed.

FileName.description: The filename of the source PDF file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.pdf' and not 'file'

FileContent.description: Optional - The content of the source PDF file

OperationId.description: Optional - The identifier of a source operation

TextRegions.description: The collection of regions to to extract text from and return.

FinalOperation.description: Set whether this is the final operation for this document

Name.description: The name assigned to the text region

LowerLeftXCoordinate.description: The number of points from the left edge of the page to the lower left corner of the rectangle text region

LowerLeftYCoordinate.description: The number of points from the bottom edge of the page to the lower left corner of the rectangle text region

UpperRightXCoordinate.description: The number of points from the left edge of the page to the upper right corner of the rectangle text region

UpperRightYCoordinate.description: The number of points from the bottom edge of the page to the upper right corner of the rectangle text region

Page Number.description: The number of the page to extract text from

TextRegionResults.description: A collection of text region results.

HttpStatusCode.description: The HTTP Status code for the response.

HttpStatusMessage.description: The HTTP Status message for the response.

OperationId.description: The unique ID assigned to this operation.

Errors.description: An array of error messages should an error occur.

Operation Status.description: Indicates whether the operation has completed, has been queued or has failed.

Name.description: The name assigned to the text region

Text.description: The text extracted via OCR from the specified region

PageNumber.description: The number of the page the text was extracted from

FileName.description: The filename of the source PDF file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.pdf' and not 'file'

fileContent.description: Optional - The content of the source PDF file

operationId.description: Optional - The identifier of a source operation

htmlHeaderFooter.description: The HTML to embed as a header or footer within the document

HtmlHeaderFooterLocation.description: Set whether the HTML should be added to the header, footer of both locations.

ApplyTo.description: Set which pages within the PDF document to apply the HTML header or footer.

pageNumbers.description: Specify the page numbers where the HTML header or footer should be applied, this property only applies when the 'Apply To' property is set to 'Specific'.

ignorePageNumbers.description: Specify the page numbers where the HTML header or footer should not applied, this property only applies when the 'Apply To' property is set to 'Specific'.

MarginBottom.description: Set the bottom margin value (pt), which determines the height of the footers container. The default value is set to -1, whereby a minus value does not change the existing page margin value.

FinalOperation.description: Set whether this is the final operation for this document

MarginRight.description: Set the right margin value(pt). The default value is set to 0.

MarginLeft.description: Set the left margin value (pt). The default value is set to 0.

MarginTop.description: Set the top margin value (pt). The default value is set to -1, whereby a minus value does not change the existing margin value.

HttpStatusCode.description: The HTTP Status code for the response.

HttpStatusMessage.description: The HTTP Status message for the response.

OperationId.description: The unique ID assigned to this operation.

Errors.description: An array of error messages should an error occur.

Operation Status.description: Indicates whether the operation has completed, has been queued or has failed.

FileName.description: The filename of the source PDF file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.pdf' and not 'file'

fileContent.description: Optional - The content of the source PDF file

operationId.description: Optional - The identifier of a source operation

StartPage.description: Set which page to start adding page number(s) from.

StartNumber.description: Set the starting number for the page number(s) added to the document.

PageNumberFormat.description: Set the format of the page number(s) added to the document, where [PageNumber] is replaced by the current page number and [TotalPages] is replaced by the total number of pages.

HorizontalAlignment.description: Set the horizontal alignment of the page number(s) added to the document, the default value is Center.

MarginTop.description: Set the top margin value (pt). The default value is set to 20.

MarginRight.description: Set the right margin value(pt). The default value is set to 20.

MarginBottom.description: Set the bottom margin value (pt). The default value is set to 20.

MarginLeft.description: Set the left margin value (pt). The default value is set to 20.

AddToBackground.description: Set whether the page number(s) should be added to top or bottom layer of the PDF document. The default setting (false) adds the page number(s) to the top layer.

Font.description: Specify the name of the font, if the font cannot be found the default 'Arial' will be used.

FontColour.description: Set the HTML colour of the font, the default colour is set to #000000.

FontSize.description: Set the size of the font, the default size is set to 14.

Opacity.description: Set the opacity of the page number(s), valid values range from 0.0+ to 1.0, the default value is 1.0

FinalOperation.description: Set whether this is the final operation for this document

FileName.description: The filename of the source PDF file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.pdf' and not 'file'

FileContent.description: Optional - The content of the source file

OperationId.description: Optional - The identifier of a source operation

StartPage.description: Sets the page number to begin text layer extraction from.

EndPage.description: Sets the page number to end text layer extraction from. The default value is set to the last page of the PDF document provided.

TextEncodingType.description: The encoding type used for text extraction.

FinalOperation.description: Set whether this is the final operation for this document

TextLayer.description: The text layer extracted from the PDF document.

fileContent.description: Optional - The content of the source PDF file

operationId.description: Optional - The identifier of a source operation

Redactions.description: The collection of redactions to apply to this PDF document

FinalOperation.description: Set whether this is the final PDF operation for this PDF document

SearchText.description: The text to search for and apply the specified redaction to.

SearchExpression.description: Specify a regular expression to seek matching text and apply the specified redaction to.

RedactionColour.description: The redaction colour to apply to the redaction, the default value is #000000 (Black)

FileName.description: The filename of the source image file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.png' and not 'file'

FileContent.description: The content of the source image file

ImageResizeType.description: Set whether the image should be resized to a ratio or specific dimensions.

ResizePercentage.description: For percentage resize actions - Set the percentage the image should be decrased or increased in size by.

ImageWidth.description: For specific resize actions - Set the specific width of the image in pixels

ImageHeight.description: For specific resize actions - Set the specific height of the image in pixels

MaintainAspectRatio.description: For specific resize actions - If true, the image height will be automatically set relevant to the image width provided.

FinalOperation.description: Set whether this is the final operation for this document

FileName.description: The filename of the source PDF file, the file extension is mandatory: 'file.pdf' and not 'file'

FileContent.description: Optional - The content of the source PDF file

OperationId.description: Optional - The identifier of a source operation

Phrases.description: The collection of text phrases to locate and replace.

FinalOperation.description: Set whether this is the final operation for this document

SearchText.description: Optional - The text to locate and replace with the 'Replacement Text' value

IsExpression.description: Set whether the 'Search Text' value should be evaluted as a regular expression, the default value is 'false'

ReplacementText.description: The text to replace the 'Search Text' text with

Font.description: The name of the font to use for the 'Replacement Text', the default font is 'Arial'

FontSize.description: The size of the font to use for the 'Replacement Text', the default size is '16'

FontColour.description: The HTML colour of the font to use for the 'Replacement Text', the default colour is '#000000'

BackgroundColour.description: The background HTML colour to use for the 'Replacement Text', the default colour is '#FFFFFF'

Underline.description: Set whether the 'Replacement Text' should be underlined, the default value is 'false'

WordSpacing.description: The word spacing to apply to the 'Replacement Text'

LineSpacing.description: The line spacing to apply to the 'Replacement Text'
